item.title:
holesky recovery update: re-enabled attestation, but we are only around 50% participation
if you have holesky keys (esp. large numbers), please get them back online asap

item.title:
RT by @ralexstokes: Quick Holesky incident update:
- EL config issue is fixed, releases out - CL clients struggle to sync, working on patches, some are being tested right now - We expect to save Holesky by building on the minority chain ðŸ¤ž
ACD check-in scheduled for 14:00 UTC tomorrow ðŸ«¡
item.dc:creator: @TimBeiko
item.description:
Quick Holesky incident update:

- EL config issue is fixed, releases out
- CL clients struggle to sync, working on patches, some are being tested right now
- We expect to save Holesky by building on the minority chain ðŸ¤ž

ACD check-in scheduled for 14:00 UTC tomorrow ðŸ«¡

nitter.freedit.eu/parithosh_j/status/1894236676567785814#m

item.title:
sorry this is gonna be giga-niche
but i hope one day there is a PL where you can write any computation and then easily delimit some chunk to emit a ZKP during execution
think delimited continuation meets real-time proving

item.title:
whats the state of the art on LLM-backed intents wallet for ethereum?
i should be able to tell an agent what i want to do, it should do biometric auth on my device for the entire flow, and then go off to execute
item.dc:creator: @ralexstokes
item.description:

i should be able to tell an agent what i want to do, it should do biometric auth on my device for the entire flow, and then go off to execute
